definition: the act of surrendering (usually under agreed conditions), give up or agree to forgo to the power or possession of another
details:
noun
- the act of surrendering (usually under agreed conditions)
= synonyms: capitulation, fall
- the delivery of a principal into lawful custody
- a verbal act of admitting defeat
= synonyms: giving up, yielding
- acceptance of despair
= synonyms: resignation
verb
- give up or agree to forgo to the power or possession of another
= example: give up or agree to forgo to the power or possession of another
= synonyms: give up
- relinquish possession or control over
= example: relinquish possession or control over
= synonyms: deliver, give up, cede
